title: 19. Where I get all of our food- Walking you through my best grocery sources
description:
Get all of my sources in this checklist HERE. 

Some of these links are affiliate links, which means I make a small commission at no extra cost to you.

Fed from the Farm- They sell raw milk, grass fed beef, pork, eggs, chicken (This is where I get chickens in bulk.)

Brockman Dairy- This is where I get raw milk, butter and eggs. 

Azure Standard- Azure Market Cheddar Cheese, Raw, White, 5 lb

Thrive Market- I get coconut flakes, coconut chips, coconut oil, 

Country Life Natural Foods- I get a 5 gallon bucket of raw honey from here.

Mockmill- This is where I get 50 lbs of organic einkorn berries. 


To find local meat and milk in your area check out these sources: Eat Wild and Real Milk
dc:creator: Lisa Bass
